member.name: T:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger
member.summary: Contains static methods used to arrange calculated area of steel considering economy,code requirement,symetry and congestion constraints.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetCombinations(System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32[]},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double},System.Int32[])
member.summary: Gets all the possible bar combinations of the given bar constraints to cover the given area below a certain area limit.
member.param: Diameters of the bar constriants sorted in descending order of size.
The calculated area of steel which is going to be covered by each combination. It is the area to be covered by the bars passed.
The maximum allowable area for a combination.
The original area of steel for which the combinations are going to be computed.
Used to hold all the combinations in the form of array of bar numbers in the same order as they appear in the constraints array.
Used to store the area of a combination found at the same index in the Combinations collection. Can be initialized with an appropriate new collection object.

Represents a single combination. The numbers represent the number of a bar at the same index in the constraints array. At the first call to the method pass a new object having equal dimention as that of the diameters array.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.FillTheRestOfBars(System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Completes a combination by assigning a value zero to the bars beyond a given index. This is used when the bars already inserted in the combination are enough and thus to make sure that the rest of the numbers are zero.
member.param: The combination to be completed.
The index of the combination beyond which all the combination members are to be zero. The element at the index will not be altered.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GenerateRemainderDiameters(System.Double[],System.Double[]@)
member.summary: Generates an array of diameters for next recursion from the current diameters array.
member.param: The current array of diameters.
The array to be passed to the next recursion. It is one element less than the current diameters array.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.StoreCombination(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32[]},System.Int32[],System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double},System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Stores a completed combination and its total area to their corresponding collection at their appropriate location so that at the end both collection would be sorted in ascending order of total area used.
member.param: Holds the arrays representing each of the combinations. They are sorted in ascending order of their total area.
A complete combination ready to be put into the collection of combination at its appropriate order.
Holds the areas of combinations lying in the combinations collection at the same index.
The total area of the completed combination. Both the combination and this area will have the same index in their corresponding collections.
The maximum allowable for a combination to have. If a combination has an area more than this area, it won't be placed in combinations collection.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetAreaOf(System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the area of a number of bars of the same diameter given their diameter and number only.
member.param: The diameter of the bars.
The number of the bars. For a single bar just leave this parameter unassigned.
member.returns: The total area of the given number of bars.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetNumberOf(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the minimum number of a certain bar to cover a given area.
member.param: The diameter of the bar.
The area to covered by the number of bars.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetRows(System.Double[],System.Int32[],System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns arranged rows of bars for a given combination.
member.param: Diameters of the bars used in the combination in descending order of diameter.
Number of each bar for each diameter in the combination.
The usable width on which the bars can be palced.
The minimum clear distance between two bars.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetMinWidthForEachDiam(System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: Returns minimum widths requiredEffectiveDepth for each diameters, if only one bar is used.
member.param: Diameter of bars used.
Minimum clear spacing between two bars

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetWidthFor(System.Double,System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the width requiredEffectiveDepth for a given diameter,number of bars and minimum spacing.
member.param: Diameter of the bars used
Number of bars in the width
Minimum clear spacing between two bars

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetNumbOfBarsForWidth(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Return the maximum possible number of bars in a given width for a given diameter and minimum spacing.
member.param: Width on which the bars are going to be distributed.
Diameter of the bar used.
Minimum clear distance between two bars.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.CompleteRow(System.Double[],System.Int32[],System.Double@,System.Double,System.Int32[],System.Double[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Completes the given row by filling smaller bars if the space is not enough to place larger bars.
member.param: Diameters used in the combination.
Number of each Diameter of bars.
The remaining width on which samaller bars are going to be placed.
Minimum clear spacing between two bars.
Row which is needed to be complited.
Minimum width requiredEffectiveDepth for each diameters of bar if only one bars is used.
The index of diameter from which smaller bars are going to be checked.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.IsAllElementsEmpty(System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: checks if the elements of a combination are zero after a specified index.
member.param: Combination to be checked
Index at which the checkin starts.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetSymmetricArrangements(System.Double[],System.Int32[],System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the most symmetric arrangement of a row given the diameters and the corresponding numbers, effective width of the row. It also fills the centroid of the arrangement into a refernce variable.
member.param: An array containing all the diameters in the row. Some may exist evenif their number is zero.
Holds the number of the bars in the row. Its members may be odd, even or zero.
The effective width occupied by the bars of the row.
member.returns: The arrangement with diameters and the corresponding coordinates measured from the center line.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.FillArrangement(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double@,System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: Fills the arrangement of bars whose diameters and the clear spacing are passed in a one dimensional array. It fills the coordinate of the arrangement with the least centroid.
member.param: An array to hold the order of the best arrangement with its corresponding coordinates. Pass the variable to hold the final arrangement here.
A temporary array to hold any arrangement until it will be compared to the best arrangement by their centroid.
Holds by reference, the centroid of the best arrangement.
The diameters of the bars. If there are duplicates in these diameters, this method is no efficient, use GetSymmetricArrangements() method instead.
The clear spacing between bars.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.Copy(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Copies the first two dimensional double array to the second two dimensional array elementwisely.
member.param: The array to be copied.
The array to receive the copied array.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.InitializeBestArrangement(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double@,System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes the BestArrangement array by filling all the diameters passed by putting them in the same order as they appear in the diameters array. It simultaneously fills the centroid into a variable passed by reference.
member.param: The BestArray to be initialized. It has second dimension of two, for diameter and coordinate. The second dimension shall be equal to the length of the diameters array.
The reference to a variable holding the centroid of the best arrangement.
Array of bar diameters to be arranged into the row.
The average clear spacing to be applied between the bars.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.FillCoordinates(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double)
member.summary: Fills the coordinates of the bars whose diameters are specified in the first index of the second dimension based on the average spacing passed.
member.param: An array holding an arrangement. It is a two dimensional array whose first index of its second dimension is filled with the diameters of the bars in the arrangement. The coordinates are going to be filled into the second elements of the second dimension.
Is the average clear spacing between bars to be adopting while placing the bars.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetWidth(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the total effective width occupied by all bars placed in an arrangement given the arrangement and the average clear spacing.
member.param: A two dimensional array holding the diameters of the bars in the first index of the second dimension.
The average clear spacing between bars.
member.returns: The total effective width occupied by the bars and the spacing between them.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetCentroid(System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Gets the centroid of an arrangement in the horizontal axis measured from the mid-point of the distribution width. Positive is considered to the right of the mid-point.
member.param: A two dimensional array containing the diameters in its first index of the second dimension and its coordinates in the second index of the second dimension.
member.returns: The centroid of an arrangement measured from the center of the distribution width.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.FillSubDiameters(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Fills the SubDiameters array which is one less than the diameters array with all the elements of the diameters array except the element at a specified index.
member.param: The source of the diameters to be filled into the subDiameters array.
An array to be filled with diamters. Its length is one less than that of the main diamters array.
The index of an elelement in the main diameters array which is not to be included in the subDiameters array.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetSpacing(System.Double[],System.Int32[],System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the average clear spacing between bars, given their diameters and the total effective width for a row of bars. It is assumed that when the number of bars is placed into the row the minimum spacing requirement is satisfied so that there is no need to check for it here.
member.param: An array containing the diameters of different bars found in the row.
The corresponding number of the bars whose diameters are passed by the Diameters array parameter.
The total effective width occupied by both the bars and the clear spacing between them.
member.returns: Returns the equal or average clear spacing between the bars of the row so that there is no spare space left at the end.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetOddDiameters(System.Double[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: Gets a one dimensional array containing the diameters of the bars whose number in the row when passed first was odd. It also alters the odd numbers in NumberOfBars array to even numbers by subtracting one from each.
member.param: The array containing the diameters of the bars contained in the row.
The number of the corresponding bars whose diameters are specified in the diameters array.
member.returns: A one dimensional array containing the diameters of the bars whose number in the row was odd when first entered. There will be no duplicate in this array unless there was a duplicate diameter in the original diameters array with all odd numbered.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.IsOdd(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if a number passed is odd number.
member.param: The number to be checked for oddness.
member.returns: true is the number is odd and false it is not odd, i.e. even.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.FillCombinationY_Coordinates(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double[0:,0:]},System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,ESADS_Mechanics.eRelativeStirrupPosition,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double[]})
member.summary: Fills the Y-coordinates measured from the furthest concrete compression fiber from the neutral axis, of each of the bars in a combination. The combination shall be arranged into rows beforehand.
member.param: List of the rows in which each row is expressed as two dimensional array, the first dimension equal to the bar types involved in a row and the second dimension of two. The first index of the second dimension of any bar is the dimeter of the bar. The second index is not used here.
The total height of the concrete beam, i.e. from the furthest compression fiber to the furthest tension fiber of concrete.
The concrete cover provided for any steel to be far from the concrete surface.
The diameter of the stirrup used to hold the longitudinal bars in place.
Minimum allowable clear spacing between bars both horizontally and vertically.
The ralative position of the stirrups relative to the longitudinal bar that they hold. This doesn't concern the bottom row in which the stirrup is always on the bottom of the longitudinal bars.
List to be filled by the array of coordinates in the same order as the RowsOfComb.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.FillRowY_Coordinates(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double[],System.Double,ESADS_Mechanics.eRelativeStirrupPosition)
member.summary: Fills the y-coordinates of each of the bars based on the basic coordinate of the row passed.
member.param: Contains the diameters in the first index of the second dimension for each bar represented by an index in the first dimension.
Array to be filled with the y coordinates in the same order as they appear in the diameters array.
The common coordinate for a row.
Condition of the stirrup whether it is on top of the main bars or not.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.IsCongested(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double[0:,0:]},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double[]},System.Double)
member.summary: Checks if a combination causes congestion by comparing the minimum reinforcement fiber coordinate.
member.param: Holds the collection of rows each represented by the diameters of the bars arranged in descending order.
The y-coordinates of the bars specified in the same order as the diameters.
The depth of neutral axis measured from the furthest compressive concrete fiber.
member.returns: Returns true if the combinatio is congested and false otherwise.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetEffectiveWidth(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns effective width for a given beam section.
member.param: Gross width of the beam.
Diameter of stirrup used in the beam.
Thickness of concrete cover used in the design.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.SortDescending(System.Double[])
member.summary: Sortes given Diameters of bars in descending order. The calculation is performed by refference.
member.param: Diameters used as a Constraint.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.RemoveBarsWithZeroNumber(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32[]},System.Double[])
member.summary: Returns list of rows removing all bars with zero number of bars as an element.
member.param: Rows of a combination on which diameters with zero elements to be removed.
Set of diameters from which the combination is going to be generated.

member.name: M:ESADS_Mechanics.eBarManeger.GetCombinations(System.Double,System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,ESADS_Mechanics.eRelativeStirrupPosition)
member.summary: Returns list of possible most economical arrangments of bar combination with all properties filled.
member.param: Calculated area of steel for strength.
Set of bar diameter user preferences from which the combinations are to be generate from.
Maximum allowable area of steel from code requirment.
Gross width of the beam.
Gross depth of the beam.
Distance of nutrual axis from top compresion fiber.
Minimum clear spacing between two bars.
Thickness of concrete cover used in the design.
Diameter of stirrup used in the beam.
Orientation of the stirrup i.e. Stirrup at bottom or Stirrup at top of logtudinal bar.

member.name: T:ESADS_Mechanics.DesignFailurEvenHandler
member.summary: Delegates all event handler methods which are related to desing failur.

member.name: T:ESADS_Mechanics.eRelativeStirrupPosition
member.summary: Specifies the orientation of of stirrups holding the logtudinal bars.

member.name: F:ESADS_Mechanics.eRelativeStirrupPosition.StirrupAtBottom
member.summary: Specifies Orientation with bottom stirrup and top longtudinal bar.

member.name: F:ESADS_Mechanics.eRelativeStirrupPosition.StirrupAtTop
member.summary: Specifies Orientation with top stirrup and bottom longtudinal bar.

member.name: T:ESADS_Mechanics.eExposureType
member.summary: Enumerates the variours Enviromental exposure conditions for Deciding the minimum reinforcement Cover

member.name: F:ESADS_Mechanics.eExposureType.Mild
member.summary: Represents Exposures in Dry Enviroment: Interior of a building Normal Habituation office [EBCS _1995 7.1.3 Concrete Cover to Reinforcement,Table 7.2 Minimum Cover Requirements for Concrete Members]

member.name: F:ESADS_Mechanics.eExposureType.Moderate
member.summary: Represents Exposures in Humid environment:Interior components (e.g. laundries); exterior components;components in non-aggressive soil and/or in water[EBCS1995 Table 7.2 Minimum Cover Requirements for Concrete Members]

member.name: F:ESADS_Mechanics.eExposureType.Severe
member.summary: Represents Exposures Sever Enviromental Condition[EBCS1995 Table 7.2 Minimum Cover Requirements for Concrete Members]
